properties.ACTIVITY_1: Some elements dig themselves without paying the PDG.
properties.ACTIVITY_2: The FDLR are not directly involved in mining. They supply the town with goods and trade them for minerals, which they sell in Uvira or Tanzania often through Congolese middlemen.
